audio_description: Assalamu Alaikum. Today, we’re going to share a very amazing, very easy, and colorful recipe with you — Kashmiri Biryani. I'm going to show you a style of Kashmiri Biryani you've probably never eaten or made before.

audio_description: The tomatoes are soft now. Add spices: half a teaspoon turmeric powder, one spoon red chili, two spoons biryani masala, one spoon salt, and half a teaspoon cumin seeds. Sauté the spices for 2-3 minutes.
